name: Prayr Media
description:
Prayr is a card swiping app that lets users swipe right to send prayers to the gods. They can interact with the gods through their messages to discover who the gods are and what they want.

Media is one of the gods you can interact with. Because the app is slightly buggy, I'm uploading all of the messages you can go through between the characters. This is a conversation you could have with Media.

For this project, I used characters and quotes from the American Gods franchise but also took creative freedom with some of their messages.

This is in not associated with American Gods or Neil Gaiman in any way.
